item.description:
We are a raw vegan cafe offering delicious, high quality, raw vegan meals. We support local farms and seek out the very best organic ingredients from socially and environmentally conscious suppliers. We are committed to quality and want to share our passion for good food with the community. We refrain from using gluten, soy, sugar, honey, mushrooms and all animal products. All our packaging is compostable or reusable. Revitalive is truly living foods that offers real healing solutions that taste GREAT! Revitalive Cafe offers everything to-go so you can integrate raw food easily into your busy life. Please ask to be seated with Meetup and introduce yourself to group. You may contact members via messages to carpool. Enjoy! www.revitalivecafe.com

(posted by essenic.com)
item.how_to_find_us: Please ask to be seated with Meetup and introduce yourself to group. You may contact members via messages to carpool. Enjoy!
item.name: Revitalive Cafe (Newburyport)
